projects.title: TangleBoard
projects.description: Tangleboard is a highly experimental chat forum based on the distributed ledger technology known as IOTA. With data being stored on the IOTA ledger, no additional backend or database is needed. The forum works out of the box using only a frontend web application that interacts with the IOTA ledger.

projects.title: Dreamwalker
projects.description: Dreamwalker is a small project providing users with an interactive and meditative experience. By navigating through different relaxing soundscapes combined with visuals, one can explore different kinds of ambiance in a meditative way.

projects.title: Bartr
projects.description: Bartr is a web application used for casually trading items of any kind with people in your local area. By simple swiping yes or no one can match your own item you want to trade with someone elses item, after which a chat is made available where a meeting can be determined.
